website_summaries.verdict: If you like the ankle strap style, they are worth considering. However, you may not find them comfortable for occasions that require hours of wear.
pros: Attractive 4-inch heels that come in numerous colors and patterns
Most ladies who own them find that they run true to size as indicated
cons: The insoles don't have very thick padding, and they tend to get uncomfortable after wearing them for a while

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty shoes for going out on the town
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty shoes for going out on the town. They are not meant to be worn all day. My wife wears a size 5+. These were size 6 and true to size, (5.5 was not available), so they are a bit large, which is why we only gave them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: wolf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Usually between a 7.5-8 depending on the shoe / heel height and I went with the 7.5. They fit perfect and easy to walk in. Absolutely beautiful ! Going to wear these to a wedding
customer_reviews.author: Cruise__Control

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad actually!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the packaging.... Very nice. The shoes are an actual material fabric and NOT a screen print which is very nice. They run small... I wear 10 & ordered an 11 but they're still just a tad snug. If you wear a wide, you should order 1.5 sizes up or avoid all together. Overall, they look wonderful and with a sole pad I'm sure they'll feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Dai

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these shoes as they looked so nice online. However, they only deserve three stars in my opinion. Like other reviewers, I noticed that the quality of the shoes isn't great. One shoe had padding in it, while the other didn't. Also, there are some minor scuff marks on the sides of the shoes. Unfortunately, they were also very uncomfortable to wear, even within just the first hour. (And I'm someone that practically lives in high heels) I ordered a size 7.5, and they were a little wide, but not enough to be a problem. Pros: Pretty, nice design, inexpensive Cons: Uncomfortable, poor quality
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: these high heels are a must have!!! very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Quality isn't amaaaazing but for the price it's pretty good. I can feel the plastic lining and stitching. Sometimes the glittery part will scratch your skin. Nothing some heel cushions or bandaid won't fix. Pros- looks great! I got the gold and boy it is a glitterfest! But the glitter doesn't flake as much. Comfort is pretty nice, first time wearing it and my feet did not hurt until 5 hours in at a holiday party. See pictures ... sorry for the weird crop Update Wore it again for a wedding and my ankles died! The glitter and plastic strap pretty much destroyed my ankles. I mean you pay for what you get, just know it's not too comfy...
customer_reviews.author: Kami Joy

customer_reviews.title: Look pretty, not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful straight out of the box. The design is so pretty and flattering BUT... I don't have wide feet at all and these were a bit tight around the ball of my foot, it felt like I was being squished out of the shoe. They were also a little taller than I had anticipated, but that was my error. I've had a lot of different heels and I understand they aren't made for comfort, but I thought these were more uncomfortable than expected. I returned them. Four stars for design and look, one for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni D.

customer_reviews.title: For Display Only
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my graduation from nursing school because I was super proud of myself and wanted to look fabulous. And I did. I got tons of compliments on them from family, classmates, and strangers alike. Totally not worth it when I ended up praying for my life and dignity to remain in tact when the ankle strap broke at the ceremony right before I walked across the stage. This was on the first day I ever wore them by the way. They are also as uncomfortable as all the other reviews suggest even when lined with moleskin and good inserts. Literally only buy these shoes if you are a masochistic, high-stakes gambler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all but looks very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this purchase. I have a few shoes from this brand and those are really comfortable. I loved this pink heels and ordered with so much excitement. These are gorgeous but I could hardly stand without hurting my toes. Very uncomfortable to stand and walking is just a big task. If you want them for the looks then go ahead but don't expect it to be comfortable .. I will be returning these and I am still in hunt for the Pink heels..😔
customer_reviews.author: Thatsmyside

customer_reviews.title: 😍 Gorgeous Pink babies👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: These are very beautiful shoes. They are a nice style, very trendy and unique. Unfortunately, as beautiful as there are I'm not a huge fan of sueade shoes. Especially if there lighter colored shoes. I feel they tend to attract dirt and get dirty fast. So I have to send them back and continue my search for these in patient leather instead. But for those who can handle that type of material these are a for sure go 👍🏾. Love the heel height and aren't too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kortiana 😘

customer_reviews.title: Wore them for my Graduation and received compliments
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for my graduation. I usually wear a 8.5 in Women's but I brought a size 9 for space because my feet are kind of wide. Heels are never really comfortable for me per say, but I managed to walk across the stage in moderate comfort and high style. I do plan to wear them again as well (when the opportunity arises). I don't think this shoe is meant to be worn more than 4 hours, but then again I am not a heel enthusiast so maybe if your a pro at wearing heels you can get more wear a day, overall I do love the quality and style of this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Lane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I even have bunions, and they are not an issue with this darling shoe! The kitten heels are perfect for me, at 180 lbs, 64 years old, 5'9". I had ordered from the same dream pair Company, a pair of 4" heels, and my leg muscles would have needed months of training, ha ha. But this pair is just perfect, and since I wear an 11, I was grateful to find my size. Thank you Dream Pair, and Amazon!!!!! I got the baby blue.
customer_reviews.author: mark sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Strap is problematic
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect;y, but strap is difficult to put on and take off. Had to fight with it so long I just finished putting them on in the car. Had to sit down and take them off for same reason due to difficulty with strap. Otherwise, shoe gave me no problems after wearing for work for 9 hours and had no problems with height of heel. If you have wide feet, you may want to consider the part that cuts off as it can cause problems after extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pearli

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Walking Not for Dancing!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are super cute and I received several compliments. I purchased 9.5. Shoot fit good. Toe area was comfortable and the strap gave good ankle support. The arch doesn’t line up with my foot, which I believe led to the need to take them off after walking and dancing for 2.5hrs. I’ll wear again but to an event which requires mostly sitting and limited walking. I’m a dancer and just were not the most comfortable shoes to dance the night away in. Otherwise I do love the look even with jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big ankles beware.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in a size 7 but the straps on the ankles with just trying on were cutting the back of my ankles even with loosening them. It felt like that rough cheap like material but I really liked them so I exchanged them for a 7.5 and that did the trick which worked out well with the fit because I added a gel insert and my feet were comfortable for the entire evening with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Zalez

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nude pair of shoes to wear with my nude and pale pink dresses but I can’t walk in super high heels they hurt my knees, these were a perfect fit and feels very comfortable to walk in. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are nice
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, they did not have my size at the time of purchase, so I took a half size smaller. Results; the front is a bit more snug than I would like. But it is still comfortable to wear and move around in for like half a day. Had it been the correct size, it would have been perfect for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: NordS

customer_reviews.title: Best brand of Amazon shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7.5 in heels. I am returning for a size 8. Outside of the sizing the shoe is amazing!!! Received the size 8, which is perfect! Can’t really say to go a size up or down. My shoe size depends on the brand and style!! Tennis shoes I’m a 8, sandals 7.5 (depends on style and brand).. Flats a 7... boots depends... just like clothes depends on style and brand
customer_reviews.author: AutumnBreeze22

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes for over 12 hrs with very little problem. Usually I can't wear heels and end up with blisters and very sore feet. Wore these to a wedding and did a significant amount of walking and dancing and standing, and while the balls of my feet were sore the next day, I had no blisters anywhere which is a miracle. The shoes are very cute, and fit well. I have wide feet so I ordered a half size up and had no problem with pinching or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had some bcbg just like these that were my go-to heels for going out
customer_reviews.text: I wore them to a wedding, my fault to think that they'd be ok for that long. I had some bcbg just like these that were my go-to heels for going out, I could wear them all night. These are not comfortable to walk in for any length of time, I kept trying to find places to sit. They seemed higher than they looked and the sides of the back kind of bow out by the heel instead of hug your foot. Maybe they'll get broken in, I will try again in a shorter time period, like just to dinner or something.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty uncomfortable, though
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 9 and bought a 9, and it fit as expected! I was hoping the red color was a slightly darker red than pictured and it is! They are pretty uncomfortable, though. I wouldn't want to stand in them all night. They are adorable, though! However, I decided to return them for a more vintage, rounded-toe shoe.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOO COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Whelp, I’m officially speechless! Purchased this because most of the reviews said it was the most comfy heel they’ve ever worn... and I HATE heels! Always get blisters, trip, end up taking them off and never wearing them again.... NOT THESE! These are absolutely incredibly THE MOST COMFORTABLE heels I’ve ever worn! I love the simplicity of them but yet still so stylish. The clasps are incorporated into the support around the ankle, and that is much appreciated! Love these! :)
customer_reviews.author: Autumn H.🍁

customer_reviews.title: Love!! Came packaged nice
customer_reviews.text: Love!! Came packaged nice, no damage or issues. Fits as expected. They look great on and are very easy to walk in. (if you are used to taller shoes) Only issue was the buckle around the ankle. It is hard to move, and adjust. I assume over time, and use, it will become easier. Also, the color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: CMiles1985

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Dream Pairs does it again. I have the same shoe in a low heel block and Love them. Dared to wear these to my cousin's wedding and I am not someone who wears heels, really ever. I danced all night in these. I have wider toes but no pain. Note: I always wrap moleskin around my toes, and insert ball cushion. But these shoes are sturdy, sexy, and classic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ****B-E-A-U-T-I-F-U-L****
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Dream Paris shoes and I am still impressed. The floral colors are exact as pictures. You can wear several different colors. They definitely stand out. Very sturdy and made to last. Fit true to size. Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Crystrh1

customer_reviews.title: Surprised in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was so surprised how well these fit and how comfortable they were to walk in. I put insoles in the balls of the feet in them for extra comfort but they were easy to move in and very fashionable. And can I say true to size too?? I'm sometimes a 8, sometimes a 9, and went with the 8.5: fit, perfectly! With online orders you never know, but this was really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are BEAUTIFUL I love them so much
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are BEAUTIFUL I love them so much , the only problem was the right shoe kinda folded at the back but that was fine with me nothing to complain about I wore them with a dress (Also got from amazon) and they looked BEAUTIFUL together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: wore them for an interview, they are comfortable for office work, i wouldnt want to wear them for a night out dancing or anything. they fit nice. I do see how some had an issue with the ankle part being small but it worked for me. 5ft2in 150lbs female
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered an 11. This shoe was super cute and the color was cute on me as well, BUT they were too tall for me. Which made it uncomfortable to walk in. BUT that is not the shoe fault, it's mine because since being on quarantine, I haven't been in heels.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm an avid high heels wearer and love finding quality shoes at a steal
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid high heels wearer and love finding quality shoes at a steal, but these are simply horrible. The ankle strap digs in because it's way too stiff and does not flex with your foot/ankle movement. If it already hurts while trying it on, imagine what it would do if you're out and about. Not to mention the strap broke off when trying on for the first time. They also seemed a bit small when trying on. If you're in between sizes I would recommend buying a size up. Unfortunately I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The are not narrow and tight roomy around toes
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are a beautful blue shoe, went perfect with my blue dress, I'm wearing to a relative wedding, they are true to size, I normally wear a 6/12 in heels if ordering an open toe, and usually order a 7 in close toes especially pumps, they fit perfect..I like that they are not narrow around the front and don't pitch my toes, will be buying again in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: I wore these for 8 hours. Comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: I love heels, but usually dread them if I have to be on my feet for long, or walk a lot. When I wore these, I brought a pair of flats with me, just in case, but I didn't need them. Mind you, I walked on uneven asphalt, cobblestones, grass and I didn't wabble once. I'm going to order in more colors. This will be my go-to heel.
customer_reviews.author: Dez P.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Shoes I have in every color and duplicate I which they were made in more colors always within the same price range also is an issued with availability this shoes has a 4 inch heel but amazing they are very comfortable I do ware them for many hours its easy to dress up and down as with jeans and a blouse or a party dress I have received so many compliments I have also gifted to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCES PUERTO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & comfy for a stiletto!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and well constructed. My feet are secure and can walk on stairs and different flooring - hardwood, cement, rug. I am usually between 8.5 and 9, ordered 9 and they were kind of loose but after strapped in are perfect. I ordered in light pink and may have to wear with everything. The suede material isnt heavy so can wear during all seasons. Absolutely love these!!
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Great balance in them. Comfortable. Not bright red.
customer_reviews.text: Great balance in them. Comfortable. Returning them because I was looking for a red shoes and these are very desaturated. Some of the photos show the shoes as bright red - They’re not. But I would definitely buy these if I needed comfortable heels in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible.
customer_reviews.text: I adore these heels. They’re exactly what I was looking for. I’m a 7, I ordered a 7.5. I knew I’d be doing a lot of walking so I wanted them bigger. They gave me a blister - but I walked a lot. They’re fabulous and I’d buy em all over again if I could. Gorgeous color!!! So vibrant. I mean, look at these pictures!
customer_reviews.author: emma_lee_em

customer_reviews.title: Ankle issues, shoe was rubbing skin unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: So ladies/queens...fyi, it's good to read reviews. I saw one young lady had issues with how the back of the shoe rubbed sores into her ankles/lower part of her legs...well I have thicker legs/ankles and I've had this problem B4 with certain shoes. The shoes are absolutely gorgeous, the heel is a little high for me...but YES the shoes rubbed/dug into my ankles/legs. Didn't wear them out and about...so I'll be returning. Again beautiful shoe esp the floral one!!! There's a nice little cushion made into the shoe 2. Skinny ankles enjoy 😉
customer_reviews.author: Nikki-Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the price should be the giveaway here.
customer_reviews.text: The buckles are very difficult to fasten and unfasten. The backs of the shoes dig into the ankles, as does the area where the buckle fastens. Other than the pain they cause, the fit is good, they're cute, and they're easy to walk in. I don't want to have to wrap my ankle in order to wear these, so I'm going to donate them rather than spend the time to break them in. I'm not sure they can be broken in. I recommend saving up for a more comfortable pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I really liked the design on the outside. When I received them and tried them on I found them to be pretty uncomfortable. The shoe material also looked pretty cheap and was a fabric-like material.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: This material is a black suede not black leather material
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the elegant look. This shoe was true to my size 5. I loved the pink shoebox packaging. I was very afraid about ordering these shoes. I wore them out to dinner with family. No problems The bottoms are made well. Buckles that go around ankle very durable. These shoes are well worth The buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 8 to 8.5 in heels. Most commonly 8.5. But in these shoes an 8 fit perfectly. The color is bright and beautiful. (Barbie pink) The material is pretty but does get dirty easily. Its a suede material. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfy
customer_reviews.text: This show is super cute but for how high the heel is personally it made my ankles hurt minutes after wear. Also with such a high heel, the mid of my foot was not even touching the shoe making a painful arch
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but check sizing
customer_reviews.text: I Was so excited when I opened the box. The pricing was amazing the shoes were so nice and then I tried them on . I ordered an 8 1/2 the box said an 8 1/2. The shoes said a 9. I had no choice but to wear them big since it was my sisters bridal shower. I am beyond upset about this because I cannot return them since they are worn and I can never wear them again since they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: prep girl

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to walk in!
customer_reviews.text: I wear heels a lot and am used to it, but these are very difficult to walk in. I bought them for a Christmas party and thank God it was only a couple of hours. Took them off in the truck on the way home. Not comfortable at all and too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no way
customer_reviews.text: These were really tight on my average feet. I’ve never had any issues with fitting. Also felt as if the tiny heel was going to break off any second. I didn’t leave the house with them on I had to return them they were too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: alicia lewis

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: My true size is 10 1/2, but all they had was 11. There was a little extra space, but they were surprisingly comfortable.. And I walked in them for an hour carrying heavy bags - no blisters, no pain, nothing! Theses are the heels you want to wear for a long night out..
customer_reviews.author: Erika C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been skeptical about buying shoes online because sometimes they look good but arrive cheap. Not these though! These shoes are very cute. I have just received them and they fit comfortably so after a few wears, I will report back with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought these shoes are absolutely stunning but they were really uncomfortable. I wear heels all the time but with these my feet were hurting after a couple of hours. I managed to survive but I feel like I need extra cushion the next time I wear them. They are beautiful and I received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Emely

customer_reviews.title: Down size! Way big!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6 1/2 to a size 7. In a size 7 my toes barely even made it to the toe area. Overall nice heels I guess if they were sized right..packaged nicely, came early.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute shoes. I normally wear a 7.5, so that is what I ordered. I probably could of got a 7 but was a afraid they would be to tight and uncomfortable. Update: I wore them last night and they were very comfortable, I wore them from 5:30-midnight, walked a few blocks, up and down stairs no problem
customer_reviews.author: ckjkt5

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! They fit as expected and are great quality for the price. I have not worn them out yet, but can tell the edges will need some softening before wearing. Only downside: they came damaged. The strap of one shoe looks to have been cut (picture included). However, the customer service team was very prompt and helpful. They prepaid return shipping and I ordered a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Mahn

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute but the material inside the shoe not the best you could see the glue and it had some sort of bumpy object I could feel every time I put them on but it was glued to the shoe so I couldn’t just brush it off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty comfortable, absolutely GORGEOUS 😍 I was pleasantly surprised ...
customer_reviews.text: True to size, pretty comfortable, absolutely GORGEOUS 😍 I was pleasantly surprised that these did not squeeze my toes because usually pointy toe shoes do. Would definitely recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonoholic

customer_reviews.title: These heels are extra sexy! Check out the photo and you'll see why!
customer_reviews.text: This picture says it all. The heels are sexy as all get out. After I got the first pair, I ordered six more in different colors and patterns! You're gonna love the look of these babies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Saw previous reviews were the shoes came in damaged or scuffed. Mine came in in perfect condition. Each shoes was in an individual bag then inside of the shoe box. The shoes itself fits perfect. The buckles are a little hard to work with but that's no problem. I fit on a similar pair at Dillard's and they felt similar but the price for those were $100
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Catalan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Wore them all day with no issues. Were a little uncomfortable once my feet started to sweat but that will not be a problem next time I will have my inserts to keep my feet from sliding. Got tons of compliments. Can definitely wear to work or out for a night on the town.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, extremely painful for wear
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe but so painful! I wear heels for work but these are beyond wearable for longer than very small bursts. I originally bought these as wedding reception shoes but had to find something else because these were just too painful and pinched way too much to even wear for longer than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the most comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a winter wedding, and let me tell you they are the MOST comfortable dress shoes I've ever worn. I wore them to a rehearsal dinner, then walking for hours all downtown Columbia, SC and then again at the wedding/afterparty. I got so many compliments on them, and they were so easy to walk in. I'm going to buy them in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I wore them for 6 hours and danced in them! They were great!!! Beautiful look, comfortable, and affordable! Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because the glitter comes off a little bit and I wasn’t a fan of glitter all over my bathroom after I opened these, but other than that, gorgeous shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: They are a great neutral and look really awesome with a tea length ...
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on these shoes. They are a great neutral and look really awesome with a tea length dress. Very Under the Tuscan Sun meets classy 50's and modern vibe all at once. They broke in easily with no pinching or blisters. However, know that everyone will know you are coming because they do have a tendency to be a bit squeaky in the ankle straps.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes but not for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute but just don’t work for me. The color didn’t work for my dress even though these were listed as Royal but shading was off so much could not use them. The heel is VERY high and not comfortable. I listened to other reviewers and ordered half size smaller WRONG move. Order your regular size
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable heels
customer_reviews.text: These heels are my go to heels. I love them. They are so comfortable for everyday use. They look great with dresses even jeans if you want to dress casual. Extremely comfortable. I bought the same pair in nude.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any outfit!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! They can also be worn with literally anything, the nude color is super versatile. Despite being a few inches high, I also had no trouble walking around in them (even out on the dance floor). I ordered a 7 and these were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended... Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for how it looks... Looks beautiful but so uncomfortable cheaply made and I'm not picky ladies. Can't walk specially going down the stairs or up. The strap is NOT stretchy at all so you pull on your skin as you walk making it so painful. Material is cheap and itchy on skin I loved the look but disappointed by how uncomfortable they are. Not meant for somewhat wide feet... Truly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: would love them in numerous colors but order true to size ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how people feet are made, It was so many reviews and I wear an 8 1/2 or 9. I should of went with a 9 due to the narrow part of the front of the shoe. Never wore them but now Im stuck with them. LOOOVEEE These, SEXXXI shoe, would love them in numerous colors but order true to size for comfort. My feet are sensitive and highly upset I listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Jiles

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are gorgeous!!! Love them fit perfectly. Little bit tight from belt other than shoes are beautiful!!! I really recommend them and I will buy another pair of shoes. Got them on time!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Martinez

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe to go with a dress I had. Loved them. Matched perfectly. Got tons of compliments. I ordered a size 9 because thT is what I normally wear. could hat bought a 8 and a half. Made them work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I wear these at work 8.5hrs/day. A lot of people have comments about the shoes rubbing their tendons raw, but that will happen in most ankle heels if you have them too tight (they can be a lot looser than most people think). I've had no problems with blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ankle band is TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I'm a runner and apparently this makes my ankles too large for this miniature ankle band. I haven't had this issue with any other heels with ankle straps previously:( the heels are otherwise very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are SO cute. I get so many compliments on them. The only problem was I went to a wedding in them and danced a lot and got a blister on the back of my leg where the strap sits but pain is beauty. They’re so cute
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them!
customer_reviews.text: Let us talk about these shoes! They are power shoes. I trot around on the very bottom of the corporate ladder feeling like a million bucks & I'm loving every second of it. They also do not *clink, clank* - 100% silent heels. They are perfect. Size, fit, everthing!
customer_reviews.author: Kg23

customer_reviews.title: Small feet and these actually fit!
customer_reviews.text: Im a size 5 and it's always difficult to find shoes in my size. These fit just right but I cannot imagine them being too comfortable a long period of time (which is what other reviews have said), which obviously isn't uncommon when it comes to shoes. Therefore I'm going to wait to wear them for the right occasion. Regardless, still a great looking shoe and I look forward to wearing them (despite the anticipated pain)!
customer_reviews.author: kimanne

customer_reviews.title: It is BEAUTIFUL & Shimmering
customer_reviews.text: I got the gold in a 6.5 shoe size and it is really Marvelous. It has just the right amount of glitter so that I'm just shimmering all over the place!!! I'm stepping high and enjoying it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs VEE

customer_reviews.title: Toe box too big
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, but toe box was way too big. I could fit all my fingers in there! Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's sleek and fits fantastic which is hard because I'm size 11. They seem like they'll last a good long time. They're surprisingly pretty comfortable. Love them - one of my favorite pairs
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Right shoe tighter than left shoe
customer_reviews.text: My left shoe fits fine but the right shoe fits tight around the )> part of the shoe. Like where the joints of your big toe (bunion if you have one) and the pinky toe joint. Hope I described that well enough. I guess my right foot is wider than my left but I've never had that issue with any other shoes. Cute shoe all in all.
customer_reviews.author: Shica

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke on first wear
customer_reviews.text: The ankle strap broke on the first wear. I was in them for less than 2 hours, standing and walking. Do not buy these heels. They might fit well, but it isn't worth only getting one wear out of them. Very disappointed. Will never purchase Dream Pairs again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defect on front of toe box
customer_reviews.text: Liked these, but there was a spot of the velvet rubbed off on the front toe when I got them. ...Might have been for the best, as these were REALLY tall heels - higher than I expected, though that's on me for not knowing. Otherwise, the quality was good for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: The most Beautiful Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are AMAZING. Súper confortable. I wear a size 7.5 and have narrow feet, they fit perfectly. You will love them! 👠
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Laica

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased: )
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were beyond my expectation. I wear size 9.5 but my feet are on the wider side; hence, it is much easier to try on shoes before purchasing, particularly for pointed-toe shoes. I took the risk of getting these shoes in 9.5M and to my surprise, they fit perfectly...no pinching or aching after wearing them for 5 hours with standing and sitting intervals. I am pleased :)
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: A very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I really am impressed at how well they fit and how comfortable they are on my feet and on my ankles. I'm short I'm five ft. So I like that they give me some height and that there so comfortable and beautiful. Thank you so much, can't wait to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and stylish shoe. Blue is very vibrant, true to size and stylish. I haven’t worn them long enough to know if they hurt my feet or not, but so far they are working out for me!! The heel isn’t that tall though, other than that, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A.

customer_reviews.title: I literally couldn't walk in them
customer_reviews.text: They fit and looked cute but I couldn't walk in them. i don't know if it was because of the strap around the ankle or I'm just getting old, but if you're not use to walking in heels, these aren't the shoes for you. I had to send back. I couldn't take more than 4 steps.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. O. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: 5 and I ordered the exact size and they fix great. I got lots of compliments on these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 8.5 and I ordered the exact size and they fix great. I got lots of compliments on these shoes. But I gave it 4 stars because they are so uncomfortable is worn for long hours. I got to church at 10 And got out at 1pm. My feet was killing me. I woukd recommend Only wear for short periods
customer_reviews.author: Tawauna Gill

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased for my college gala. It went so perfect with my red dress. I felt like a princess in these shoes. I was able to stay in them all night and the heel was not too high (and I don't wear heels). I got compliments from head to toe. I have to find some where to wear these shoes can't let them go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: BrittBratt513

customer_reviews.title: Good for looks, not for feel.
customer_reviews.text: Material is not comfortable around ankles(got the flower print), and the sole isnt very supportive. Ive bought other heels for similar price and these are a bit of a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Netaliacadaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heels!
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes! I don't typically l buy the "bargain" shoes but these are amazing. They fit well. They do fit somewhat wide. I can wear these all day long without hurting. They provide great support while still looking good. I don't know how they do it! For the price, you really can't beat it. I also purchased a pair in nude and they are also great!
customer_reviews.author: LtnPrncess

customer_reviews.title: Mine were damanged upon arrival but I kept them and am satisfied thus far
customer_reviews.text: So mine were already damaged when I got them. Some of the leather was scratched off or something around the toe part. They're still cute, reasonably priced, and haven't really hurt my feet yet. Wearing them right now actually. The ankle straps are something to get used to, dangerous to drive in as there's not too much mobility. You're not supposed to drive in heels anyways so...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best. I'm blessed! I wear a size 10 and due to my body weight has difficulty balancing in certain types of heels. This shoe from DreamPairs is the best, it is comfortable, it fits well on my big feet ' and is true to size. These can be worn to parties, work wherever! I am happy with my purchase and will order more from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough about the comfort, feel, ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about the comfort, feel ,and look of these shoes... especially for the price! I have paid over $100 for shoes that dont compare to these. I wore them for a wedding [all day affair] and intend to get them in different colors. The other bridesmaids all got blisters and had to take their shoes off by the end of the night. I wore mine home and didn't have a complaint with them at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlena

customer_reviews.title: These shoes worked for me for a quick and inexpensive ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes worked for me for a quick and inexpensive pair of heels to wear out for the night! I have very wide feet, so shoes do not typically fit width wise but these worked. After wearing them for a few hours they started to hurt the sides of my feet but that is only because my feet are so wide. They are obviously not top quality or material but I was not expecting them to be for such an inexpensive price. Regardless I will probably buy at least 2 more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit much bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were exactly as pictured but far too big. Amazon recommended a 7 1/2 (which I usually am) but I could have ordered a 6 1/2 and it would have fit. These were way too big.
customer_reviews.author: OhSaySugar

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful! Perfect heel height and surprisingly comfortable! I danced at a wedding untill about 11pm, way longer than I expected. The toe box was very comfy for being pointy. I love these shoes! (best dress EVER from Venus!)
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Tant

customer_reviews.title: Lovely looking shoes but the arch wasn't right.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit was just off, made me feel like I couldn't stand straight. Maybe playing around with different sizes would help.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: these are reasonably comfortable. I went up half a size to give ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a shimmery champagne color, and they're gorgeous. As far as heels go, these are reasonably comfortable. I went up half a size to give my feet some more room for my toes, and the ankle strap keeps the shoes from slipping off, so it's pretty perfect! I've gotten lots of compliments on them. Very happy with my purchase and would definitely buy it in more colors. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Painful
customer_reviews.text: They are gorgeous, they fit great. Unfortunately, you will only be wearing them to pose for photos or paintings or sitting still at a bar. Trust me, these are no dancing shoes. The strap is thick so it will blister your ankles on all angles. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Shopologist

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for about 7 hours to a wedding, and wedding after party. Feet started hurting after maybe 8 hours of drinks and dancing. Easy to walk in, super comfy and gorgeous shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Whitty Lee

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now
customer_reviews.text: These are SO cute. I haven’t worn them for an extended period of time yet, but as far as I can tell they are also comfortable. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lolocf

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Omg great quality and received so many compliments. This is my first day wearing and I have walked a lot. Any other heel on the first day of wearing I would have kicked off by now ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: love them !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was like half size too big which is odd but i do love them and theyre super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Taylor

product_meta.title: DREAM PAIRS Oppointed-Ankle Women's Pointed Toe Ankle Strap D'Orsay High Heel Stiletto Pumps Shoes.
feature_bullets: FITTING TIPS: RUNS TRUE TO SIZE!!
